          Get an instance of the class based on remote middleware home path.
static MiddlewareFactory MiddlewareFactory.install(AuthInfo authInfo, java.io.File gzFile, java.lang.String targetPath, java.util.List<Module> modules)
          If remote middleware is not there, we can call this method to install it remotely.

抛出 RemoteException 的 org.cs2c.nginlib.config 中的方法
 void RemoteOperator.append(Element element, java.lang.String outerBlockNames)
          Put the element at the end of the target block.
 void RemoteOperator.delete(Element element, java.lang.String outerBlockNames)
          Delete the specific element in the specific block which the outerBlockNames string indicates.
 java.util.List<Block> RemoteOperator.getBlocks(java.lang.String blockName, java.lang.String outerBlockNames)
          Query all blocks with the specific block name in the specific block which the outerBlockNames string indicates.
 void RemoteOperator.insertAfter(Element element, Element after, java.lang.String outerBlockNames)
          Insert the specific element after another element in the specific block which the outerBlockNames string indicates.
 void RemoteOperator.replace(Element oldElement, Element newElement, java.lang.String outerBlockNames)
          Replace the specific old element with the new element in the specific block which the outerBlockNames string indicates.

          Deploy web site into remote nginx.
 void Controller.reload()
          Reload the Nginx configure file to make it take effect.
 void Controller.restart()
          Restart the remote Nginx
 void Controller.shutdown()
          Shutdown the remote Nginx.
 void Controller.start()
          Start the remote Nginx.
 

org.cs2c.nginlib.monitor 中 RemoteException 的使用
 

抛出 RemoteException 的 org.cs2c.nginlib.monitor 中的方法
 CPUStatus Monitor.getCPUStatus()
          Remotely fetch the CPU status info, and return a CPUStatus handler by which to get the info already fetched.
 IOStatus Monitor.getIOStatus()
          Remotely fetch the IO status info, and return a IOStatus handler by which to get the info already fetched.
 MemoryStatus Monitor.getMemoryStatus()
          Remotely fetch the memory status info, and return a MemoryStatus handler by which to get the info already fetched.
 MiddlewareStatus Monitor.getMiddlewareStatus()
          Remotely fetch the mid-ware status info, and return a MiddlewareStatus handler by which to get the info already fetched.
 NetworkStatus Monitor.getNetworkStatus()
          Remotely fetch the network status info, and return a NetworkStatus handler by which to get the info already fetched.
